362.question: What was their result on Stance Sentiment Emotion Corpus?

5-TableII-1.png: S1: only secondary attention 75.52 - S2: primary + secondary attention 77.58 - Single task system for Emotion Analysis E1: only secondary attention 64.94 - E2: primary + secondary attention 66.66 - Multi-task system - - - M1: only secondary attention 81.17 - M2: primary + secondary attention 82.10 - - -

363.question: What performance did they obtain on the SemEval dataset?

5-TableII-1.png: The performance obtained on the SemEval dataset was 75.51 for the primary + secondary attention model, 77.58 for the primary + secondary attention + secondary attention model, 81.17 for the only secondary attention model, 82.10 for the primary + secondary attention model, and 65.44 for the multi-task system.

364.question: What are the state-of-the-art systems?

5-TableIII-1.png: UWB [38] INF-URFGS-OPINION-MINING [39] LitisMind pkudblab [40] SVM + γ -grams + sentiment [8] M2 [proposal] Sentiment (F-score) 42.12 41.23 41.66 56.28 78.90 82.10

364.answer: For sentiment analysis UWB, INF-UFRGS-OPINION-MINING, LitisMind, pkudblab and SVM + n-grams + sentiment and for emotion analysis MaxEnt, SVM, LSTM, BiLSTM and CNN
